privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.welcome: Welcome to IziGoal. The protection of your personal data is our priority.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection and Usage
dataCollection.description: IziGoal is an application that works entirely locally on your device. We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal data to external servers.

points.storage: All your data is stored only on your device
points.noSharing: No data is shared with third parties

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.description: Your goals and progress data are exclusively saved in your device's local storage. You maintain complete control over your data and can delete it at any time by uninstalling the application.

permissions.title: App Permissions
permissions.description: IziGoal does not request any special permissions on your device beyond those strictly necessary for basic operation.
